Name: XTHRUST
About the game: XTHRUST - Rocket Drone Racing Simple Controls - Hard to Master Fly your rocket drone in round based multiplayer races and single player challenges. Beat the best times, gain XP with spectacular flying and win races to earn coins. Race through a growing range of maps and upgrade your rocket drone. Single Player: Tutorial Time Trial Missions Global Ranking Leaderboards Special Achievements Multiplayer: Time Trial Race Maps Gem Hunt Global Ranking Leaderboards Advanced Spectator Mode Best Time Ghosts (personal best, next best, world record) Global: Custom Drone Upgrades Difficulty Classes (beginner, amateur, casual, pro, master) XP, Coins and Levels Steam Achievements
Meta Title: XTHRUST: Mar 12, 2021, XTHRUST LLC and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on XTHRUST? Check out the release date (Mar 12, 2021), developer insights from XTHRUST LLC, and a complete game summary.
